channel.title: Need SIMPLE help
channel.description:
This is probably a very simple thing to do, but I am using a source called PwnScape, and when you equip Godsword you carry it horizontally, not vertically like any other 2 handed sword. I just need to know the area of what I need to edit, and perhaps a simple guide on how to do it, if it wouldn't cause anyone too much trouble.
Thanks - Vice

item.title: Need SIMPLE help
item.dc:creator: @Vice117 Vice117
item.description:
@Vice117 wrote:

Okay, thanks a lot guys, I got it.
Thanks for your help :D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 12, 2009, 01:43:09 pm[/size][hr]Hm, i thought it was working but it wasn’t

I messed it up pretty badly, (I won’t go into detail) and had to delete what i just added.

If it isn’t too much of a bother, could someone please tell me their ‘getWepAnim’ for any godsword…

Sorry, i just can’t seem to get it working…

Read full topic

item.title: Need SIMPLE help
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

if(id == WeaponID) { return AnimID; }

Read full topic

item.title: Need SIMPLE help
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

Stand/walk/run anim in client.java

Read full topic

item.title: Need SIMPLE help
item.dc:creator: @Vice117 Vice117
item.description:
@Vice117 wrote:

I do believe I said ‘PROBABLY’. Why have a go at me? (With all do respect).

But also, thank you for the answer. See, it was simple, no? Of course it was… you could sum it up in one sentence.

And just because it is simple, doesn’t mean someone wouldn’t need help with it, as this forum is called ‘Server help’.

But thank you very much, mate.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 11, 2009, 07:16:08 am[/size][hr]Sorry to post another ‘pointless’ question… but does anyone know how I can edit the ‘getWepAnim’ properly…

if(id == 6522)
{
return 3353;
}

All i see is lots of those… and should one of these have the ID of the weapon I want to edit. If not should I add one with the ID of the weapon i want… and yes, i do realize that i should probably be looking for a tutorial on this. so please don’t post comments that won’t help anyone…

Read full topic

item.title: Need SIMPLE help
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

If the problem is so ‘SIMPLE’, why post here? Next time, please have a title that pertains to your problem.

As for the problem, edit the animation in the ‘getWepAnim’ method located in the client class.

Read full topic
